name: Westminster Center
description:
At Westminster Center, with our specialised team, the focus is given Music Therapy & Speech and Language Services.

The Center is open from Monday to Friday from 0900 to 1700.
practicalInfo:
Westminster Center is located in the heart of London.

The modality of access: This is possible through appointment requested via either email of telephon. The contacts are linked below.

name: Colosseo Care Center
description:
Colosseo Care Center is one of We Care locations located in the heart of Rome.

Services offered at this location are Music Therapy and Psychotherapy .

The Center is open from Monday to Friday from 0900 to 1700.
practicalInfo: The modality to access the location is through the application sent via email..
address: Via di Monte del Gallo, 113, 00165 Roma

name: Bygdøy Children Center
description:
Bygdøy Children Center offers Psychotherapy and Pshycomotricity services to childre and young adult

The Center is open from Monday to Friday from 0900 to 1600.
practicalInfo: This center is accessible through an appointment. The specialist will valuate your child and follow up the case. For more information please reffer to the contacts below.

name: København Children Center
description:
København Children Multisevice Center offers Music Therapy and Physiotherapy services to childre and young adults. The center was built in March 2018 and is located at 15 km off the city of Copenhagen.

The Center is open from Monday to Friday from 0900 to 1700.
practicalInfo: The center recieves and help children in need of these services. For more information on how to access the services, please contact us.

name: Bolzano Language Center
description:
Bolzano Speech and Language Center offers Speech and Language Services to children up to the age of 14 years old.

The Center is open from Monday to Friday from 0830 to 1630.
practicalInfo: In order to access the services here, please book an appointment through the contacts below.
